functions.name: light_sensor_init
functions.description: Initializes the light sensor on the big green board.

functions.name: light_sensor_read_lux
functions.description: Reads the light intensity in lux.

functions.name: light_sensor_set_threshold
functions.description: Sets a threshold for light intensity. If the light intensity exceeds this threshold, an event can be triggered.

functions.name: light_sensor_enable_interrupt
functions.description: Enables an interrupt that triggers when the light intensity exceeds the set threshold.

functions.name: light_sensor_get_status
functions.description: Returns the current status of the light sensor, including whether the threshold has been exceeded.
